Name: Ginger Mojito
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add mint and lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise). Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with ginger ale.
Review: A spiced variation on the classic Mojito.
History: For more recipes, its origins and history, see the Mojito Cocktail .
